DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, multi-center, non-randomized study to evaluate performance of an external monitor for heart failure patients
DOC.brief_title: Monitor Patients With Acute Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: External monitoring of heart failure patients with the AVIVO System.
DOC.criteria: Is female or male, 18 years of age or older Has an ejection fraction of 40% reported within 12 months of enrollment Having acute decompensated heart failure and receiving treatment for fluid overload Is participating in another clinical study that may confound the results of this study
